suite.name: Login

test.name: Cenario: POST Fazer Login Com Sucesso 200

kw.name: Criar Sessao
kw.doc: Inicia uma sessão na API ServeRest com alias 'serverest'

kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=serverest, url=https://serverest.dev, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: Obter Dados De Usuario Existente
kw.doc: Retorna os dados do primeiro usuário na lista de usuários cadastrados

kw.name: GET On Session
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: GET Request : url=https://serverest.dev/usuarios path_url=/usuarios headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.28.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None

C:\Python38\lib\site-packages\urllib3\connectionpool.py:1045: InsecureRequestWarning: Unverified HTTPS request is being made to host 'serverest.dev'. Adding certificate verification is strongly advised. See: https://urllib3.readthedocs.io/en/1.26.x/advanced-usage.html#ssl-warnings warnings.warn(
${resposta} = <Response [200]>

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.
kw.msg: &{primeiro_usuario} = { nome=Fulano da Silva | email=fulano@qa.com | password=teste | administrador=true | _id=0uxuPY0cbmQhpEz1 }
&{usuario} = { nome=Fulano da Silva | email=fulano@qa.com | password=teste | administrador=true | _id=0uxuPY0cbmQhpEz1 }

kw.name: Obter Informacoes De Login
kw.doc: Extrai somente email e senha de um json contendo todas as informações de um usuário

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.
kw.msg: &{login} = { email=fulano@qa.com | password=teste }
&{login} = { email=fulano@qa.com | password=teste }

kw.name: Enviar POST
kw.doc: Envia um POST contendo o argumento body

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: POST Request : url=https://serverest.dev/login path_url=/login headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.28.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '47', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"email": "fulano@qa.com", "password": "teste"}'

C:\Python38\lib\site-packages\urllib3\connectionpool.py:1045: InsecureRequestWarning: Unverified HTTPS request is being made to host 'serverest.dev'. Adding certificate verification is strongly advised. See: https://urllib3.readthedocs.io/en/1.26.x/advanced-usage.html#ssl-warnings warnings.warn(
${resposta} = <Response [200]>
${resposta} = <Response [200]>

kw.name: Validar Status Code
kw.doc: Verifica se o status code na resposta é o mesmo que o esperado

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Integers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to integers.
kw.msg: Argument types are: <class 'int'> <class 'str'>

kw.name: Validar Mensagem
kw.doc: Verifica se a propriedade 'message' da resposta é a mesma que o esperado

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

test.doc: Teste de caminho feliz para POST /login
